00013 class RadSiteClass : public AbstractClass
00014 {
00015 public:
00016         //Static
00017         static DynamicVectorClass<RadSiteClass*>* Array;
00018 
00019         //IPersist
00020         virtual HRESULT _stdcall GetClassID(CLSID* pClassID) R0;
00021 
00022         //IPersistStream
00023         virtual HRESULT _stdcall Load(IStream* pStm) R0;
00024         virtual HRESULT _stdcall Save(IStream* pStm,BOOL fClearDirty) R0;

00026         //Destructor
00027         virtual ~RadSiteClass() RX;
00028 
00029         //AbstractClass
00030         virtual eAbstractType WhatAmI() R0;
00031         virtual int Size() R0;
00032 
00033         //CUSTOM Constructor (to make things easier)
00034         RadSiteClass(CellStruct nBaseCoords, int nSpread, int nRadLevel):AbstractClass(false)
00035         {
00036                 THISCALL(0x65B1E0);
00037                 BaseCell = nBaseCoords;
00038                 Spread = nSpread;
00039                 Spread_Leptons = (nSpread << 8) + 0x80;
00040 
00041                 PUSH_VAR32(nRadLevel);
00042                 THISCALL(0x65B4F0);
00043         }
00044 
00045         //non-virtual
00046 public:
00047         void Activate()
00048                 JMP_THIS(0x65B580); //Start irradiating an area. Be sure to set the BaseCell, Spread and RadLevel first!
00049         void Add(int nRadLevel)
00050                 JMP_THIS(0x65B530); //Add this RadLevel to the current radiation.
00051 
00052 protected:
00053         RadSiteClass() : AbstractClass(false) JMP_THIS(0x65B1E0);
00054         RadSiteClass(bool) : AbstractClass(false) { }
00055 
00056         //===========================================================================
00057         //===== Properties ==========================================================
00058         //===========================================================================
00059 
00060         PROPERTY(LightSourceClass*,    LightSource);
00061         PROPERTY_STRUCT(TimerStruct,   RadLevelTimer);
00062         PROPERTY_STRUCT(TimerStruct,   RadLightTimer);

00064         PROPERTY(int,       Spread);    //CellSpread in cells.
00065         PROPERTY(int,       Spread_Leptons);    //CellSpread in leptons.
00066         PROPERTY(int,       RadLevel);
00067         PROPERTY(DWORD,     unknown_50);

00069         PROPERTY(DWORD,     unknown_58);        //unused?

00071         PROPERTY(DWORD,     unknown_60);        //unused?
